Multiple mainstream media outlets: including Zee News, Republic TV, OneIndia, and News Nation, reported that Aatish Taseer has filed a petition in the Supreme Court challenging the revocation of his OCI card by the Indian government.
Russian news organization Sputnik also p: 4. Aatish Taseer himself refuted these claims on Twitter, stating that the reports are fake news and that he has not filed a petition in the Supreme Court yet, but is in the process of preparing his legal strategy.
